properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 1 at 11:48AM PST until March 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with
gusts to 35 mph. For the High Wind Watch, north winds 25 to 35
mph with gusts to 65 mph possible, mainly on the coastal slopes
and foothill areas and through the Cajon Pass.

* WHERE...For the Wind Advisory, all mountains. For the High wind
Watch, mainly the coastal slopes and foothill areas and through
the Cajon Pass.

* WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 3 AM PST Monday. For the
High Wind Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines.
Power outages are possible. Travel could be hazardous,
especially for high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
